channel.title: Levels...?
channel.description:
I've noticed that for the past 2 years or so, people aren't judged on their overall stats, but for their banks. I don't really get it, how is someone that worked for years to get 10+ 99s worse than a level 70 that diced for 2 months and made 5b?
Witch do you think matters more?

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Levels are better. Despite botting, some are legit. Money is so easy to come by now, cowhides are 500gpea, WTF?

Read full topic

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:29, topic:434383”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=537104.msg3927482#msg3927482 date=1330374635]

I think it’s a game and as long as you play a way that makes it enjoyable to you, that is the right way (for you).

What if someone impedes on your fun by doing something they believe is fun? Flaming, trolling, and botting?

Then you ignore them because that’s what is fun for them, and if it’s annoying you just report them and move on. A troll can’t troll if there is no response to thrive on.

How do you report bots in runescape? The way they updated it, you can only report someone if they talk.

Your account may be limited to not be able to report (just guessing) without the person talking. Happened to a few people for mass reporting. If you have your right click report on (under the tool options) you can report anyone (talking or not) for anything besides offensive account name, harassment, seriously offensive language and advertising since those are text based and are required.
[/quote]

Ah, thank you good sir.[/quote]
Ferguson and his logical and educated responses save the day again!
Now with the whole thread topic completely changed from the OP’s original one, I assume it will die.

Read full topic

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:24, topic:434383”]My dog is standing in a daze staring at me and looks utterly confused, I think he may be under the influence I know this is a topic about something runescape related but how do I find out if he is? I think he may be experimenting with drugs and I’m worried for him and want to be there for him.

Anyways yeah bank is the only thing that matters now a days.[/quote]

Wat

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:15, topic:434383”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=537104.msg3927147#msg3927147 date=1330332258]
To make a bank, you need stats. So stats > bank.
[/quote]
but you don’t you can irc dice or flower game to make the bank, the reason noone gives a shit about stats anymore is because everyone already has stats.[/quote]

I honestly couldn’t find the game fun having money but having shitty stats. You can get buy able stats sure, but you can’t get combat and others.

Read full topic

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:10, topic:434383”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=537104.msg3926926#msg3926926 date=1330309857]
I thought this topic was about judging people as RS players, not judging how their stats are beneficial. If you make 1b mining, you’re a better RS player than if you make 1b staking. That’s my opinion.
[/quote]
I do agree to this. My point, though, was that people with all 99s and 100m are called noobs, while people with 99 cooking and a phat set are practically worshiped by ‘lower’ players.[/quote]
Well I hope if you have all 99’s you would’ve made more than 100m. And yes, that’s wrong unless ofcourse the 99 cooking guy picked flax or filled vials or something for his party hat set. In which case, he’s better than all 99 guy.

Another thing; This thread is all opinion. So no one will ever win an argument here.

Read full topic

I thought this topic was about judging people as RS players, not judging how their stats are beneficial. If you make 1b mining, you’re a better RS player than if you make 1b staking. That’s my opinion.

item.title: Levels...?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“mihalich, post:8, topic:434383”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=537104.msg3926926#msg3926926 date=1330309857]

I think bank is more important, depending on how you make it.

Explain how having 1b could benefit you more than having 99 prayer 99 herblore and 99 range.

I thought this topic was about judging people as RS players, not judging how their stats are beneficial. If you make 1b mining, you’re a better RS player than if you make 1b staking. That’s my opinion.

[/quote]
But since you said money is better than stats explain how it is.[/quote]

I said getting money makes you a better player than stats. Not that having money is better than having stats.

Explanation: If you mined for 1b or picked flax, you’re obviously more dedicated than someone who staked for 1b.

Read full topic
